title: Project-Based Learning Course to Improve Scientific Problem-Solving Skills for Vocational College Students

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on problem-solving scenarios similar to real work environments, supporting collaborative learning through the use of personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can solve science field practical problems by applying a four-stage problem-solving process: problem definition → cause analysis → solution development → implementation evaluation
Learners can solve real-world science problems from industrial settings with over 80% completion rates through collaborative PBL team projects
Learners can improve problem-solving strategies at least three times by reflecting on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
